g-0: ^I'm pretty sure he wants us to make tea out of them...?
^[Vera snatches the flowers out of your hand.]
^Make tea, got it! Roger that! Thanks!
^[A few moments later, she comes back with a cup of tea in hand.]
^Lemme tell ya, I got nervous for a sec there!
^I appreciate the help! You're a good sort.
^So, what was it you needed? A boat upgrade, right?
^Give me a sec and I'll hook you up.
^[Vera downs her tea before she gets to work on installing your upgrade.]
^Are you heading out or is there anything else I could help you with?
g-1: ^I'm looking for my parents. Or at least, any trace of them... This was their boat.
^You wouldn't happen to know anything, would you?
^I thought I recognized that old thing.
^I'm sorry, kiddo, but I can't help you with that. I've no clue where your folks might've gone.
g-2: ^No problem! Let me know if there's anything else I could help you with.
